issue.title: [Dev][Archery] Adapt crossbow to store nightly build status report
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16358](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16358). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Adapt the current crossbow report code to be able to save the report status on a file to be able to be processed later.

Using these report files will allow us to build a dashboard with information related to: since when was the build failing, what was the last successful build, etcetera.
